page.title: 10A FRISKNEY FARMER
page.content: Beet harvesting and wheat drilling are on today's programme. The contractor arrived yesterday and he needs 2 tractors and carts to take the beet from the harvester to the heap. Also 1 man is needed to tidy the heap and load the lorry from the other heap as we have 2 permits. The remaining 3 men are needed for drilling the wheat to follow last year's potatoes and sugar beet.One will be ploughing, another cultivating and the third drilling and harrowing afterwards. Later the field will be top dressed with fertilizer and then a herbicide applied to control wild oats and weeds. The potato store which was filled recently needs checking to ensure that it is not overheating. The fan in the corn store might need to be used as it is a dry day. Tomorrow will be another busy autumn day.
